snippet.title: Rhythm Storm - Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Rhythm Storm's alpha demo is now available on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2135960/Rhythm_Storm/

Rhythm Storm is a roguelike bullet heaven/swarm-survival shooter with mind-blowing vector graphics, intense action, satisfying upgrades, and overwhelming swarms of enemies.  The world and enemies dance and move to the beat, but your vehicle moves and fires freely in this spectacular rhythmic experience.  It supports ultra-high resolutions and framerates, and a 1440p 120hz (or better) monitor is recommended.

For more gameplay footage directly from the Alpha Demo, please check out this video:
https://youtu.be/3aWu5lxHi_s

The full version of Rhythm Storm is expected in late 2023.  The game is developed by Luke Schneider, and the soundtrack written by Auvic.  Additional game/development details can be found on the Steam page.  Check out more of Auvic's music here:
https://linktr.ee/auvicmusic
